array.string: LOG=/var/log/macscope-vhid.log; echo "[startup] waiting for Karabiner..." >>$LOG; for i in {1..15}; do if systemextensionsctl list | grep -q "Karabiner-DriverKit-VirtualHIDDevice.*activated.*enabled" && pgrep -x "Karabiner-VirtualHIDDevice-Daemon" >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "[ok] Karabiner ready after $i tries" >>$LOG; break; fi; echo "[wait] attempt $i/15" >>$LOG; sleep 2; done; mkdir -p /var/run/macscope; chmod 777 /var/run/macscope; echo "[launch] Starting macscope-vhid relay" >>$LOG; exec /usr/local/bin/macscope-vhid --verbose >>$LOG 2>&1
